column4: Who do I bitch to this about? This afternoon I ran my updates, and all my system sounds stopped working, except for my unixcw app. I triple checked my settings, and they seemed correct, but to be sure, I tried every option available, to no avail. Hovering the mouse over the panel speaker icon showed the volume was at 100%, and right clicking on it, gave me the option to mute, so I assumed nothing was muted. But, when I finally righ
t clicked on the icon, opend and opened the volume control, all the settings were muted. Four hours down the drain due to a dysfunctional panel applet!
launchpad.net is the bitching place, but try not to be a bitch ;)
Thanks, I'm happy to have a mission critical demo box playing Pandora radio again, but miffed it cost me an afternoon to do it. I'll chill before going to launchpad.
